name: Brown-Forman Netherlands BV
goal: The responsible production, sale, and marketing of spirits and wines around the world. In the context of the Register, we seek to represent the European and global policy and commercial interests of Brown-Forman and the responsible beverage alcohol sector in dialogue with European institutions and other members of civil society.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
Files relating to production, sale, marketing, and commercialization of beverage alcohol
Files relating to health, non-communicable diseases, food labeling
Files relating to excise tax, international tax, the single market, pricing regulation
Files relating to the departure of the United Kingdom from the European Union
Files relating to tariffs and trade
